name: Gummy Bears
description: Chewy, gelatin-based lollies shaped like little bears, available in a range of fruity flavours and colours, often loved for their soft texture and nostalgic appeal.

name: Gummy Worms
description: Long, squishy lollies resembling worms, typically two-toned and packed with fruity flavours. They're a favourite for both kids and adults, often used as a playful topping for desserts.

name: Jelly Beans
description: Small, bean-shaped lollies with a hard outer shell and a soft, chewy centre, available in a wide range of flavours, from classic fruit to unique concoctions.

name: Wine Gums
description: Chewy, fruit-flavoured lollies that aren't made with wine, but often have a sophisticated taste. They come in various shapes and are known for their firm texture.

name: Chocolate Coated Peanuts
description: Crunchy roasted peanuts covered in a smooth layer of rich chocolate, offering a delightful combination of sweet and nutty flavours in every bite.

name: Fruit Flavoured Candy
description: Lollies burst with vibrant fruit flavours, often made with real fruit juices.

name: Sour Rainbow Strips
description: Long, chewy strips of candy coated in sour sugar, featuring a rainbow of fruity flavours. Their tartness makes them a popular choice for those who love a tangy treat.

name: Gummy Snakes
description: Similar to gummy worms but in a slithery snake shape, these lollies are soft and chewy, available in multiple fruity flavours and often bright colours, making them fun and appealing.

name: Jelly Tots
description: Jelly Tots are chewy, bite-sized jelly sweets coated in sugar, bursting with fruity flavours. Perfect for snacking!

name: Jelly Babies
description: Soft, adorable sweets in various fruity flavours, dusted with icing sugar. A nostalgic British favourite!

name: Jaffas
description: Chocolate-covered orange sweets with a crunchy shell. A classic movie snack, known for their zesty flavour!

name: Pineapple Lumps
description: Chewy pineapple centres with rich chocolate coating. A sweet and tangy Kiwi classic!

name: Licorice Spirals (12)
description: Chewy, spiral-shaped treats with a rich, aromatic licorice flavour. A timeless favourite for licorice lovers!

name: Citrus Candy
description: Soft candy bursting with zesty lemon, lime, and orange flavours. Refreshing and tangy for a quick treat!
